column1: Uchi////I never got the chance to try them out in Austin but I made the first available reservations when they finally came to Houston. After reviewing the entire menu
column2: my boyfriend and I decided to stay away from the "typical" makis and order what other sushi places don't have to offer. If you're one to order California rolls
column4: and the like (not that there's anything wrong with them)
column5: you're better off saving your money and going to Miyako. The food exceeded my highest expectations. Uchi is truly a fine dining experience. Once the food is brought out
column6: the runner/waiter will explain the best way to eat the dish and exactly what the dish consists of.
